talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Jack the Clown$
Welcome to the Wonderful Theme Park! Here, you will find many amazing adventures!
waiting for you. ? Complete Daily Missions and receive 4 Wonderful Theme Park Entry Tickets everyday.

$Jack the Clown$
Are you ready to enjoy another Special Adventure at the Wonderful Theme Park?

$Jack the Clown$
Each Special Adventure requires 1 Wonderful Theme Park Entry Ticket. So what shall it be today?

$Jack the Clown$ BR>300 Sparta Goblins are on their way to Canyon Ville!
Stand brave and fight against those vile creatures!
? You must be Lv.10 - Lv.31 to enter the Sparta Goblin stage.

$Jack the Clown$
Ahhh, life is a Bumpy Road indeed.
Hmmm, I wonder what kinds of traps are in stall for you. Make it through this adventure alive within 4 minutes and you will be handsomely rewarded for your bravery.

$Jack the Clown$
Rumours are flying that there's a treasure trove in an ancient monastery. It'd better be ALOT of treasures to make fighting the hordes of monsters in there worthwhile. But well, like they say, FONT color=#a82424>No Risk! No Return!!

$Jack the Clown$
Those tiresome monsters attack our towns from time to time. Should this happen, will you be strong enough to defend us? There's no better way to find out than taking on the bosses in Boss Rush!

$Jack the Clown$
I hear the monsters in Boss Rush are pretty ferocious. After all, you are confronting the bosses themselves. A little tip from me - getting a party will be a wise move if you want to make it out alive.

$Jack the Clown$
Why are we so cheerful in the chaos? *Chuckle* It is our choice to frown or laugh in any situation, no matter how dire. Besides, laughing helps to lighten things up a bit, so it doesn't seem so depressing, no?

$Jack the Clown$
A friend for today is an enemy for tomorrow. Such is the spice of life! Believe it or not, now these 500 Sparta Goblinsare on your side. Fight to defeat the Kuse Kuse together!
? You may enter the Kuse Kuse Goblin stage if you are between Lvl32-40.

$Jack the Clown$
Do you remember Orc Gim? He often says he would like to tear out your head one day, {user_nick}. Heehee!

$Jack the Clown$
Orc Gim has finished training his elite warriors and the entire orc army will be taking revenge on Saint Haven. Defend Saint Haven and protect the innocent from his rage!
